name: Strings of Fate
description:
Strings of Fate The game takes a while to load, please be patient

Our submission for Mini Jam 113: Final Boss, with the limitation of 'Stuck in a loop'!

When a cult bring back a God that was long forgotten, you take control of a robot with the only goal of putting a stop to them. But, how can you beat a God that can just rewind time to when it was more powerful?!

There are three phases to the final boss. The game is quite difficult so if you beat it very well done!

Controls
  • A - Move left
  • D - Move right
  • Shift - Dash in direction
  • S - Dash down
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Mouse - Attack
Credit Artwork
